name: Elevate Me
description:
A Merkabah led by The One invades the matrix to awaken many humans from the tyranny of the giant machine that has been using them as batteries to stay alive! It is time for a new era to emerge, welcome to the 5th dimension.

The question is will you be able to help those beings to reach salvation and wake up into higher states of consciousness?

Tap to Destroy The Death Lords and save as much Humans as you can!
